com.polarion.platform.jobs

Interface IJobUnitFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericJobUnitFactory

    public interface IJobUnitFactory
    Factory for IJobUnits (job implementations).
    Version:
    $Revision: 519826 $ $Date: 2014-04-25 14:30:24 +0200 (Fri, 25 Apr 2014) $
    Author:
    Stepan Roh, Polarion Software
    See Also:
    IJobUnitRepository

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IJobUnit createJobUnit(java.lang.String name)
      Create job unit with given name.
      IJobDescriptor getJobDescriptor(IJobUnit jobUnit)
      Job descriptor.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Job factory name.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Job factory name.

        Something like job unit class name (but shorter), normally used for IJobUnitRepository.getJobUnitFactory(String).

        Returns:
        name (not null)

      • getJobDescriptor

        IJobDescriptor getJobDescriptor(IJobUnit jobUnit)
        Job descriptor.

        May return dynamic job descriptor if and only if given job unit is not null. It is not required to provide dynamic descriptor even though user wants it, however if user has given some job unit, descriptor must return it from IJobDescriptor.getJobUnit().

        Parameters:
        jobUnit - job unit used for dynamic configuration changes (may be null)
        Returns:
        job descriptor (not null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given jobUnit comes from another factory

      • createJobUnit

        IJobUnit createJobUnit(java.lang.String name)
                throws GenericJobException
        Create job unit with given name.

        Given label will be returned from IJobUnit.getName().

        Parameters:
        name - job name
        Returns:
        created job unit (not null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null
        GenericJobException - if for some reason creation fails
